name: I'm on a watcher duty 6: Home of anomalies
name_original: I'm on a watcher duty 6: Home of anomalies
description:
The 6th game of my Observation duty fangame series.

Story: You came back from Gensokyo but your job isn't over yet. You wanted to find out what exactly happened so you decided to continue working as a watcher duty.

MMD Model credits:

montecore - Rumia model

Ki - Reisen model

anek - Koishi model

Other credits:

Paulor94 - Main creator of this fangame

Notovia (Zaster) - Original creator of "I'm on observation duty"

Abc-Guy - Made a gamepage thumbnail

This game was made with a bunch of Unity free assets and Sketchfab assets so most assets aren't belongs to me. All credits for the model go to their respective owners. (There's too many of them so I can't list them here. Sorry.)

Some pictures in the game are from Google.
